description: This Java class defines a REST controller for authentication endpoints, including user registration and login, utilizing Spring Boot annotations and security components.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: REST controller managing user registration and login endpoints, handling JWT token issuance.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Handles user registration requests, creates new user records, and returns JWT token with user info.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Handles user login requests, authenticates credentials, and returns JWT token with user info.
